name: BeeHive (itch)
description:
This is a game where you play a Bee Queen, that wants to grow her swarm of bees as big as possible.

To do so, she has to guide her bees and command them to gather pollen and honey. After the resources have been returned to the hive, you can use them to expand the surrounding flora and your hive network.

But beware, you might get some unwanted Visitors!

The Game is played with the Mouse. Click to move the swarm and use the Menu.

This game was made in 48 hours and has been submitted to the GameFrankenJam 2021.
